Articles.Content:
Hi, I made a series of videos using calculus to analyze a trip to the Mun, just sharing if anyone might be interested. 

My future plans would be landing on and exploring the Mun and launching a roadster to Duna.  This would be to demonstrate a formula for direction of bearing on any planet, and also computing phase angle for interplanetary transfer orbit.

Also there is a video on youtube by Walter Lewin where he discusses the changing orbits of a ham sandwich - I'd like to sometime reproduce that in KSP.

Edited July 28, 2019 by Christopher Vaughen
